features.title: Sew Scrubs
features.description: Become one of our Angels and make scrubs for our healthcare Heroes

features.title: Get Scrubs
features.description: Sign up to receive scrubs from our Angels, all healthcare workers are welcome to order

features.title: Support Us
features.description: You can support us in all sorts of ways. Donations are very welcome, to help us get scrubs from our Angels to our Heroes. You can also help us by partnering with us.

humanityData.title: How to order scrubs
humanityData.text: Rona Scrubs is here to help. We have volunteer Angels ready to make you your own set of scrubs and have them delivered to your door.

lists.text: Let us know how many sets of scrubs you need (we recommend 1-2 sets per Hero, so we can spread the love to as many people as possible)

promotionData.title: We need your help to make scrubs
promotionData.text1: Do you have some sewing experience? Are you willing to wash and cut fabric? Are you keen to help our healthcare workers on the frontline of the COVID-19 pandemic?
promotionData.text2: If your answer is yes to any of these questions, then we need you! Become a Rona Scrubs Angel today

lists.text: Let us know what you need
